articles.description: All the reaction to the weekend's Premier League games, including Chelsea's thrilling 4-4 draw at home to leaders Manchester City, and Arsenal beating Leicester 6-2 in the WSL.
articles.title: Premier League and WSL reaction after Chelsea-Man City classic

articles.description: The world of football will celebrate the life of Sir Bobby Charlton at his funeral in Manchester.
articles.title: Sir Bobby Charlton: Funeral of Manchester United legend to take place - BBC News

articles.description: Chelsea forward Cole Palmer, Aston Villa centre-back Ezri Konsa and Manchester City defender Rico Lewis have been called up to the England squad for the first time.
articles.title: Konsa, Palmer and Lewis called up to England squad

articles.description: Forty overs, one ball rather than two and more knockout matches - former England bowler Steven Finn maps out his plan to improve the World Cup.
articles.title: My plan to revitalise ODI World Cup - Finn column

articles.description: Chelsea were fearless against Manchester City on Sunday but Cole Palmer's penalty to earn them a point was especially brave, says MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer.
articles.title: 'Palmer not the only Chelsea player to prove a point'

articles.description: Match of the Day 2-s Alan Shearer, Ian Wright and Mark Chapman analyse how ex-Manchester City player Cole Palmer has made an impact at Chelsea.
articles.title: MOTD analysis: How 'magnificent' Palmer created vital Chelsea impact

articles.description: Late replacement Harriet Dart beats Caijsa Hennemann to give Great Britain a 3-1 victory in their Billie Jean King Cup play-off against Sweden.
articles.title: Late replacement Dart seals GB win in BJK Cup tie

articles.description: Defences were not on top as Manchester City and Chelsea played out an epic eight-goal thriller where, finally, football was the main talking point.
articles.title: 'Premier League at its best' - where does Chelsea 4-4 Man City rank?

articles.description: Bill Belichick's New England Patriots suffer another bad defeat while there are a record five walk-off wins on the 10th NFL Sunday of the season.
articles.title: Patriots lose again and a walk-off winners record

articles.description: Liverpool boss was taken back to his early days of his coaching career as the Reds beat Brentford to close the gap on Premier League leaders Manchester City.
articles.title: Liverpool close the gap as Klopp reminded of his roots
